body: You can do anything, but not everything.
author: David Allen

body: Perfection is achieved, not when there is nothing more to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

body: The richest man is not he who has the most, but he who needs the least.
author: Unknown Author

body: You miss 100 percent of the shots you never take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

body: Courage is not the absence of fear, but rather the judgement that something else is more important than fear.
author: Ambrose Redmoon

body: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
author: Gandhi

body: When hungry, eat your rice; when tired, close your eyes. Fools may laugh at me, but wise men will know what I mean.
author: Lin-chi

body: The third-rate mind is only happy when it is thinking with the majority. The second-rate mind is only happy when it is thinking with the minority. The first-rate mind is only happy when it is thinking.
author: A. A. Milne

body: To the man who only has a hammer, everything he encounters begins to look like a nail.
author: Abraham Maslow

body: We are what we repeatedly do; excellence, then, is not an act but a habit.
author: Aristotle

body: A wise man gets more use from his enemies than a fool from his friends
author: Baltasar Gracian

body: Do not seek to follow in the footsteps of the men of old; seek what they sought.
author: Basho

body: Everyone is a genius at least once a year. The real geniuses simply have their bright ideas closer together.
author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

body: What we think, or what we know, or what we believe is, in the end, of little consequence. The only consequence is what we do.
author: John Ruskin

body: The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new lands but seeing with new eyes.
author: Marcel Proust

body: Work like you don’t need money, love like you’ve never been hurt, and dance like no one’s watching
author: Unknown Author

body: Try a thing you haven’t done three times. Once, to get over the fear of doing it. Twice, to learn how to do it. And a third time, to figure out whether you like it or not.
author: Virgil Garnett Thomson

body: Even if you’re on the right track, you’ll get run over if you just sit there.
author: Will Rogers

body: People often say that motivation doesn’t last. Well, neither does bathing – that’s why we recommend it daily.
author: Zig Ziglar

body: What the world needs is more geniuses with humility, there are so few of us left.
author: Oscar Levant

body: Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much.
author: Oscar Wilde

body: The person who reads too much and uses his brain too little will fall into lazy habits of thinking.
author: Albert Einstein

body: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.
author: Aristotle

body: We learn something every day, and lots of times it’s that what we learned the day before was wrong.
author: Bill Vaughan

body: Don’t ever wrestle with a pig. You’ll both get dirty, but the pig will enjoy it.
author: Cale Yarborough

body: An inventor is simply a fellow who doesn’t take his education too seriously.
author: Charles F. Kettering

body: The cure for boredom is curiosity. There is no cure for curiosity.
author: Ellen Parr

body: The trouble with the rat race is that even if you win, you’re still a rat.
author: Lily Tomlin

body: Laughing at our mistakes can lengthen our own life. Laughing at someone else’s can shorten it.
author: Cullen Hightower

body: Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is going to determine how you're going to live your life.
author: Joel Osteen

body: Why don’t you start believing that no matter what you have or haven’t done, that your best days are still out in front of you.
author: Joel Osteen

body: God wants us to prosper financially, to have plenty of money, to fulfill the destiny He has laid out for us.
author: Joel Osteen

body: When you focus on being a blessing, God makes sure that you are always blessed in abundance.
author: Joel Osteen

body: Faith activates God - Fear activates the Enemy.
author: Joel Osteen

body: You can change your world by changing your words... Remember, death and life are in the power of the tongue.
author: Joel Osteen

body: Do all you can to make your dreams come true.
author: Joel Osteen

body: People respond when you tell them there is a great future in front of you, you can leave your past behind.
author: Joel Osteen

body: No matter how many times you get knocked down, keep getting back up. God sees your resolve. He sees your determination. And when you do everything you can do, that’s when God will step in and do what you can’t do.
author: Joel Osteen

body: If we say it long enough eventually we’re going to reap a harvest We’re going to get exactly what we’re saying
author: Joel Osteen

body: Quit questioning God and start trusting Him
author: Joel Osteen

body: This is my Bible, I am what it says I am, I have what it says I have, I can do what it says I can do
author: Joel Osteen

body: When you are tempted to get discouraged, remind yourself that according to God’s word, your future is getting brighter; you are on your way to a new level of glory You may think you’ve got a long way to go, but you need to look back at how far you’ve already come You may not be everything you want to be but at least you can thank God that you’re not what you used to be
author: Joel Osteen

body: We may get knocked down on the outside, but the key to living in victory is to learn how to get up on the insid
author: Joel Osteen

body: If you’ll dare to take your mind off your troubles, get your mind off your own needs and, instead, seek to be a blessing to other people, God will do more for you than you could even ask or think
author: Joel Osteen

body: Don’t grow accustomed to living with less, doing less, and being less to the point that you eventually sit back and accept it
author: Joel Osteen

body: Every day is a gift from God There’s no guarantee of tomorrow, so that tells me to see the good in this day to make the most of it
author: Joel Osteen

body: I believe if you keep your faith, you keep your trust, you keep the right attitude, if you’re grateful, you’ll see God open up new doors
author: Joel Osteen

body: You were not created to just get by with an average, unrewarding, or unfulfilled life God created you to leave your mark on this generation
author: Joel Osteen

body: Any of us can be happy and have a good attitude when everything is going our way But I believe it’s the real test of your character and of your faith to say, ‘Things are not going our way, but I’m still being good to people; I’m still attending church; I still have a good attitude ’
author: Joel Osteen

body: God made us for more than just barely getting by We weren’t meant to sit on the sidelines of life because with God, we are on the winning team!
author: Joel Osteen

body: There is always bad news That’s one report, but we have another report It says you are blessed, you are talented, you are creative!
author: Joel Osteen

body: I realized that worry, fear, and wrong thinking are not simply bad habits They allowt he negative to come to pass
author: Joel Osteen

body: Fear and faith have something in common Both ask us to believe something that we cannot see
author: Joel Osteen

body: when you come to a closed door, regard that as God nudging you in a better direction
author: Joel Osteen

body: You must quit looking at what you don’t have and start believing that all things are possible
author: Joel Osteen

body: Too many people have gotten comfortable, settled where they are and become too easily satisfied – time to stretch!
author: Joel Osteen

body: You didn’t just show up on planet Earth by accident You were handpicked by Almighty God
author: Joel Osteen

body: The key to future success is to not be discouraged about your past or present while you are in the process of being completed
author: Joel Osteen

body: Take your dreams and the promises God has put in your heart, and every day declare that they will come to pass
author: Joel Osteen
